name: Femenine Full body EXTENSION ♥ FURRY Base
name_original: Femenine Full body EXTENSION ♥ FURRY Base
description:
EXTENSION for the Femenine Full Body Base! 

Base made for Adoptables & reference sheets♥

New features like: chibi, mouth detail, paw detail eye detail and like+dislike box!

Support my art and my projects here: https://patreon.com/niinaxan ♥

RULES   

  •  You can edit the base.
  • Credit me if you use it.
  •  YOU ARE ALLOWED TO take YCH COMMISSIONS, Personal use and Adopts.
  • YCH commissions can have the price of 10$ to 20$, not higher!
  • Adopts can be any price! 
  • DO NOT DELETE THE WATERMARK! Add yours too for the colors and edits.
  •  You can NOT re-sell the base!
  • Have fun!

EXTRA INFO: If you take commissions with this base please credit me for the lineart

 You are not allowed to do extensions of this base, if you're interested in extensions feel free to tell me on my DM's on Patreon/Instagram.

Extensions will be made for PATRONS first on my patreon page https://patreon.com/niinaxan
